content: southern gal s crochet crochet organizer since i mostly work with amigurumi supplies shown are most of what i work with other than stuffing and a few other things finished size is approx 4 inches tall x 8 inches long x 6 5 inches wide of course these results will vary based on each individual s crochet style ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ www southerngalscrochet com crochet organizer 1 materials needed to make the organizer caddy 2 skeins of worsted weight yarn stitch marker this pattern is done by working with 2 strands held together small amount of stuffing for pin dome i used red heart super saver in color aspen print at least 2 5 oz yarn needle each more would be better if you crochet loosely i crochet pins very tight and barely had enough to sew the bottom with j hook 6 00 mm ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ special instructions this pattern is crocheted in the round unless otherwise stated mark the last stitch of each row with a stitch marker if the # is after the type of stitch each st goes in its own space if the # is before the stitch type the sts go in the same space abbreviations chain = chain blo = back loops only single_crochet = single_crochet flo = front loops only st = stitch round s = round s increase = increase fo = slip_stitch and cut decrease = decrease 2 sts sc3tog = decrease 3 sts slip_stitch = slip_stitch www southerngalscrochet com crochet organizer 2 let s begin… tube #1 1 single_crochet 6 in magic_ring or first chain 5 *single_crochet 3 increase* around 30 sts of chain 2 6 *single_crochet 4 increase* around 36 sts 2 increase around 12 sts 7 in blo single_crochet around 36 sts 3 *single_crochet increase* around 18 sts 8 - 21 single_crochet around 36 sts 14 rnds 4 *single_crochet 2 increase* around 24 sts fo leaving a tail for sewing #1 #2 tube #2 1 single_crochet 6 in magic_ring or first chain 4 in blo single_crochet around 18 sts of chain 2 5 - 15 single_crochet around 18 sts 11 rnds 2 increase around 12 sts fo leaving tail for sewing 3 *single_crochet increase* around 18 sts www southerngalscrochet com crochet organizer 3 tube #3 1 single_crochet 6 in magic_ring or first chain 5 in blo single_crochet around 24 sts of chain 2 6 -
